summary: Mansion. Standalone follower Svetlana - magician (30lv) and servants: Sesil, Jamie, Sam.
descriptionHtml:
Mansion location you watch a screen. Svetlana and Sesil standalone follower CBBE HDT.
Recommendations: XPMS skeleton, HDT Physics Extensions
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57376/?]Multiple floors sandboxing[/url] 

  Description:

A medium size player house in the Solitude style arhitecture. House is  open to the player, no key required. Comes with four potential followers that sandbox throughout the house. House is not designed for the player who likes to display all trophies acqured in the game.

  Location:

A fast travel map marker will be added to the map.
The house is located on the hill side, near a tree that has fallen across a ravine,about half way between Whiterun and Darkwater Crossing, west of Fort Amol.

  House details: 

-Cooking pot
-alhemy table
-enchanting table
-various conteiners
-shrine of: Mara, Kynareth, Julianos and Dibella
-sitting areas with various chairs and benches
-hot tub
-4 beds: 2 double, 2 single; used by all followers

  Secrete Area Details:

-Anvil
-Sharpening Stone
-Tanning Rack
-Workbench
-4 Mannequins
-Secrete exit/entrance
